seeds.name: Chicken Stew
seeds.instruction: Dump everything into water or stock. Salt, pepper, and spice to taste. Let simmer until everything is mush.

seeds.name: Tomatoes and Steak
seeds.description: A simple classic served best on rice.
seeds.instruction: Cook tomatoes til they're goop. Fry steak on the side. Mix the two. Salt to taste.

seeds.name: Bean Dip
seeds.description: In case you have a hummus craving.
seeds.instruction: Mash beans and simmer until no longer watery. Salt and spice to taste.
